rule.q: How should hypothetical performance be presented?

answer: Performance advertising must be presented fairly and not be misleading. Include material risks and limitations when discussing performance. Hypothetical performance must be labeled and accompanied by disclosures.

citations.text: Performance advertising must be presented fairly and not be misleading.
Hypothetical performance must be labeled and accompanied by disclosures.
Include material risks and limitations when discussing performance.
